title: World Athletics Championships 2025: women’s 1500m, men’s 110m hurdles and more – live
summary: Catch the key highlights and updates from the fourth evening of events in Tokyo. Join Daniel Harris for insights and coverage of the ongoing action. Stay tuned for the latest developments!

title: Sky puts 900 roles at risk in shake-up to compete with US streaming services
summary: A company plans to reduce its workforce by about 600 positions as part of a consultation process affecting its 23,000 UK employees. The decision reflects ongoing organizational changes. Management anticipates finalizing the cuts following discussions with staff.

title: Spain says it will withdraw from 2026 Eurovision song contest if Israel takes part — Europe live
summary: Spain has become the first of the 'Big Five' countries to threaten to withdraw from the Eurovision Song Contest. This decision follows a vote at state broadcaster RTVE regarding the country's participation. The move highlights increasing tensions surrounding the competition among major nations.

title: Israel launches ground offensive in Gaza City with residents warned to evacuate - latest updates
summary: The Palestinian foreign ministry warns that ongoing actions will transform the city into a "mass graveyard." This statement highlights the severe consequences of current events in the area. The ministry is calling attention to the urgent need for international intervention to prevent further devastation.

title: Surrey v Nottinghamshire, Sussex v Yorkshire, and more: county cricket, day two – live
summary: Tanya Aldred will provide updates on the recent County Championship matches. Fans can expect insights and highlights from the latest fixtures. Stay tuned for comprehensive coverage of the tournament's developments.
